text: The moment had come. the ensuing interview the future would depend. Outwardly she was calm, but her heart was beating fast, and the palms of her hands were damp. Orsini's high-crowned hat with its jaunty plume blotted out the light; his hand was on the door. Glancing at Lucia he said in French to Vittoria: 'Your maid is she reliable?'
